Uses of Package
org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.orm.jpa

  • Packages that use org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.orm.jpa 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.orm.jpa
    Auto-configuration for Data JPA tests.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.orm.jpa used by org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.orm.jpa 
    Class and Description
    AutoConfigureDataJpa
    Auto-configuration imports for typical Data JPA tests.
    AutoConfigureTestEntityManager
    Annotation that can be applied to a test class to enable auto-configuration of a TestEntityManager.
    TestEntityManager
    Alternative to EntityManager for use in JPA tests.
